browsermonkey.document
Class Token

java.lang.Object
  browsermonkey.document.Token

public class Token
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a token for use in the tokeniser and the parser. Stores the tag or text found at that position in the html file and stores information about the tag if it is one. Such as whether the tag is an end tag and attributes.

Constructor Detail

Token

public Token(java.lang.String fullTag,
             TokenType type)
Constructor for class token. Creates a new token with the supplied tag and type, extracts the tag itself and the attributes then sends it to be classified.

Parameters:
fullTag - Contains the 'full tag' in the case of text this is just text but in the case of the tag it includes the <> or and any attributes
type - Whether this token is a Tag or Text type

isEndTag

public boolean isEndTag()
Returns true if the token contains an end tag.

Returns:
True if token represents end tag

isStartTag

public boolean isStartTag()
Returns true if the token contains a start tag.

Returns:
True if this token represents a start tag

hasAttributes

public boolean hasAttributes()
Returns true if this token has any attributes in its attribute map.

Returns:
True if there are any attributes

getAttributes

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAttributes()
Returns the attribute map from this token.

Returns:
Map containing all the attributes stored for this tag token

getFullTag

public java.lang.String getFullTag()
Returns the full tag value used to create the token, i.e: the tag with all the attributes and the <> still in place.

Returns:
Full tag for this token

getType

public TokenType getType()
Returns the type of this token as a TokenType. Lets you check to see whether this is a text or tag token.

Returns:
TokenType of this token

setTag

public void setTag(java.lang.String tag)
Lets you change the tag of the token.

Parameters:
tag - Tag to change this token to

getTag

public java.lang.String getTag()
Getter for the tag variable.

Returns:
Tag for this token

classifyTag

public void classifyTag()
This method extracts any attributes that may be present in the full tag of this token. It extracts them, separates them and puts them into the attributes map. Also sets up the variables like endTag.
